import React from 'react' function LoginComponent(props){ /*componentDidMount(){ this.setState({loading : true}) fetch("/api/users/27/") .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => this.setState({ loading : false, users : data })) }*/ return(

{props.data.isInTheDB ? "Hello "+props.data.user.firstName : "Please enter a valid logging"}

{props.data.loading ? "loading..." : ""}


{props.isLogged ? "online" : "offline"}

) } export default LoginComponent
